members.name: Yaoyao Fiona Zhao
members.type: Associate Professor, Associate Editor of the Journal of Mechanical Engineering
members.description: Digitization changes traditional thinking and manufacturing technologies. Manufacturing in the 21st century will become more intelligent, flexible, automated, and sustainable. I seek to advance manufacturing industry with new design theories, manufacturing information technologies, and simulation and optimization infrastructures to reach smarter and more sustainable manufacturing.

members.name: Sheng Yang
members.description: Part consolidation for AM to study the feasibility of assembly reduction for lightweighting and economical purposes. Methods and Rules for Supporting Part Consolidation AM Design Potentials.

members.name: Zhibo Luo
members.description: Development of a simulation tool to model the selective laser melting process in part level. A new and efficient simulation scheme is designed based on open source finite element library, which is able to adaptively refine and coarsen the mesh and solve the finite element equations with multiple processors in a parallel way.
